ai-mil3.7.4:1.2_0: “Venerable Sir, how farmer you get from here?”
ai-mil3.7.4:1.3_0: “Great king, the Brahmā realm due to the Brahmā realm, the Brahmadeva’s Grove, and eight months of the Brahmā realm are placed on the ground.”
ai-mil3.7.4:2.2_0: ‘Suppose, just as a strong man might bend or stretch out his arm,
ai-mil3.7.4:2.3_0: In the same way, a mendicant with psychic powers will vanish from the Brahmā realm and appeared to him so many hundred leagues.”
ai-mil3.7.4:3.3_0: “Sir, there’s a flayed place called Nandā that I am born.”
ai-mil3.7.4:3.6_0: “Great king, do you recall having done some business there?”
ai-mil3.7.4:3.8_0: “Great king, you’ve gone to the parks of two hundred leagues.”
ai-mil3.7.4:5.1_0: The fourth enlightenment of the Brahmā realm is the fourth lost.
